name: xcfreader-monorepo
description: Monorepo for xcfreader and related packages

scripts.test: npm run test:xcfreader && npm run test:ui && npm run test:browser
scripts.coverage:all: npm run coverage -w @theprogrammingiantpanda/xcfreader && npm run test:coverage -w @theprogrammingiantpanda/ui-xcfimage
scripts.build: npm run build -w @theprogrammingiantpanda/xcfreader && npm run build -w @theprogrammingiantpanda/ui-xcfimage && npm run build -w @theprogrammingiantpanda/ha-xcfimage-card
scripts.validate:exports: attw --pack packages/xcfreader && attw --pack packages/ui-xcfimage && attw --pack packages/ha-xcfimage-card
scripts.sbom:all: npm run sbom && cyclonedx-npm --output-file packages/xcfreader/sbom.json packages/xcfreader && cyclonedx-npm --output-file packages/ui-xcfimage/sbom.json packages/ui-xcfimage && cyclonedx-npm --output-file packages/ha-xcfimage-card/sbom.json packages/ha-xcfimage-card
scripts.release: npm run build && changeset version && changeset publish
